104486.name: Share of firms for which access to finance is a major constraint (in %)
104486.datasetName: Firms with financial constraints - World Bank Enterprise Survey (2019)

source.name: World Bank Enterprise Survey (2019)
source.additionalInfo: Surveys were conducted in different years for different countries, but all during the time period of 2009 to 2018. The date displayed is standardized to 2018.
